item.title: Last minute inauguration resources
item.description:
Here are some links to resources on the Internet covering the inauguration today.

I would advise, if possible, to use a TV and cable to watch live video of the event. There is a really good chance that most of the live video over the Internet will melt down today with the number of people wanting to watch the inauguration.

Links to major news sites:
http://www.cnn.com/
http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/27721638/

http://inauguration.blogs.foxnews.com/
http://abcnews.go.com/Politics/President44/story?id=6655200&page=1
http://www.cbsnews.com/

Parade route:

[http://www.usatoday.com/news/washington/2009-01-14-inauguralparademap_N.htm][]

Photos and videos and live updates:

http://www.flickr.com/groups/inauguration2009/[
http://qik.com/event/1224/obamas-inauguration-2009/day/3
